snippet.title: Battle Pass & Customization Preview | Season 5: Reckoning | Halo Infinite
snippet.description:
A reckoning has come. Season 5 of Halo Infinite is here!

Featuring 50 tiers of rewards, including 1,000 Halo Credits and Flood-themed customization, the Reckoning Premium Battle Pass also offers players a fourth challenge slot, bonus XP while active, and never expires!

Play matches, earn XP, and unlock rewards at your own pace; once purchased the Premium Battle Pass is yours to keep and complete at your leisure.

Purchase now to instantly unlock the Defiled Bulldog Weapon Model! 

https://aka.ms/S5Launch

#haloreckoning #haloinfinite #halo
---
